long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay up-to-date with real-time cryptocurrency prices using the Crypto Price Tracker Chrome extension. This open-source extension allows you to track the prices of popular cryptocurrencies directly from your browser.

Features:

Real-time Price Updates: Get instant updates on the latest prices for a wide range of cryptocurrencies.

Coin Selection: Easily choose and monitor the cryptocurrencies that matter to you.

Customizable Display: Personalize the extension's interface to view prices in your preferred currency and format.

User-Friendly Interface: Access key information and trends in a simple and intuitive user interface.

Open Source: The Crypto Price Tracker extension is open source, allowing developers to contribute, inspect the code, and customize the extension based on their needs. Star us on Github - https://github.com/Altmaer/crypto-price-tracker-chrome-extension

Whether you are a cryptocurrency enthusiast, trader, or developer, the Crypto Price Tracker extension provides a convenient and transparent way to stay informed about the ever-changing crypto market. Get started today, explore the source code on GitHub, and keep a close eye on the prices of your favorite cryptocurrencies, right from your Chrome browser!
